member.summary: Used to set the datasource to the funding data grid on the funding edit form

member.name: M:FNSB_Facilities_Projects.PublicWorksQueries.ProjectsMiniView(FNSB_Facilities_Projects.PublicWorks.Type,System.String)
member.summary: ProjectsMiniView returns an abbreviated full Projects list instead of the full return of all data. Includes the recordid, project name, project number, project status, and project description.
member.remarks: Used in the funding add sequence - do not delete (yet)

member.summary: ProjectsMiniView returns an abbreviated full Projects list instead of the full return of all data. Includes the recordid, project name, project number, project status, and project description.
